inlineContent.text: We went to an art show today in Downtown Denton and it was such a cool experience and I can’t even put my finger on why it was. Maybe because it takes a special kind of place to make time for art these days. Art is the opposite of efficiency and maximizing profits. A community that fosters art is one that knows that it must invest in more than just the rational and defendable decisions. It must invest in beauty and things that touch us deeply.

abstract.text: David Brunow, known as Brunow [ˈbɹunoʊ] to the folks he works with, is a human living on Earth. You might have something in common with him — if you think it is ridiculous that he is talking about himself in the first person here, so does he.
